p: The activity of PPO (EC 1.10.3.1) was determined according to Kar and Mishra (1976) with minor modifications. The reaction medium consisted of the same assay mixture as that of POD without H 2O 2 and was incubated at 25°C. Readings were taken at 420. Enzymatic activities were expressed in absorbency units (unit mg –1 protein min –1).
